caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. ADREN A. BAILEY, KENNETH A. CREPPEL, CHARLES J. HOUSE,
DANIEL J. RONQUILLE, PAUL J. ROBEAUX, RONALD J. THOMASSIE,

opinion.posture: In re Adren A. Bailey, Kenneth A. Creppel, Charles J. House, Daniel J. Ronquille, Paul J. Robeaux and Ronald J. Thomassie, applying for writs of certiorari, prohibition and mandamus. Parish of Jefferson. No. 81-1523.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ denied. Relator has an adequate remedy by appeal in the event of conviction.
